addAddMutedWordMenuItemLabel_desktop.message: Add "Add muted word" to the "More" menu

addAddMutedWordMenuItemLabel_mobile.message: Add "Add muted word" to the slide-out menu

debugCountdownLabel.description: Displayed when the user clicks multiple times on the info text at the end of the Experiments section to enable debug mode
debugCountdownLabel.message: (Debug options: click $DEBUG_COUNTDOWN$ more times to enable)

debugInfo.message: Enables debug logging and displays tweet debug info in the timeline

disableHomeTimelineInfo.message: Find yourself wasting too much time on Twitter? Try preventing use of the home timeline

dropdownMenuFontWeightLabel.message: Use normal font weight in dropdown menus

extensionDescription.message: Gives you more control over Twitter and adds missing features and UI improvements

extensionDescriptionShort.message: Gives you more control over Twitter and adds missing features and UI improvements

fullWidthContentInfo.message: Hide the sidebar and let timeline content go full-width

hideExplorePageContentsLabel.message: Hide Explore page contents and use it only for searching

hideMoreSlideOutMenuItemsOptionsLabel_de.message: Hide "More" menu items you don't use

hideMoreSlideOutMenuItemsOptionsLabel_mo.message: Hide slide-out menu items you don't use

hideSidebarContentLabel.message: Hide "What's happening", "You might like" etc. in the sidebar

hideTweetAnalyticsLinksLabel.message: Analytics links under your own tweets

hideUnavailableQuoteTweetsLabel.message: Hide tweets quoting accounts you've blocked or muted

hideUnusedUiItemsOptionsLabel.message: Hide UI items you don't use

hideWhoToFollowEtcLabel.message: Hide "Who to follow", "Follow some Topics" etc. in the timeline

mutableQuoteTweetsInfo.description: The translations for 'Mute this conversation' in script.js are from Twitter's own locale data
mutableQuoteTweetsInfo.message: Adds a "Mute this conversation" menu item to Quote Tweets

navBaseFontSizeLabel.message: Use normal text font style in navigation bar

option_hide.description: Option for hiding things, e.g. Twitter Blue checks

option_ignore.description: Option for not changing existing Twitter functionality - we don't use 'Ignore' for this in English as it could be mistaken to mean 'Hide'

option_separate.description: Option for showing Retweets or Quote Tweets in a separate tab from the main timeline

reducedInteractionModeInfo.message: Hide the action bar under tweets â€“ replies are now the only means of interacting

showRelevantPeopleLabel.message: Show "Relevant people" when viewing a tweet

tweakQuoteTweetsPageLabel.message: Hide the quoted tweet when viewing Quote Tweets

unmuteButtonText.description: Button used in the options page to unmute a muted Quote Tweet
